PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-02742017-03-24INAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActIndian Act
SubjectAddition to the Enderby Indian Reserve No. 2, British Columbia
PrecisOrder setting apart 4.53 hectares (11.194 acres) of land for the use and benefit of the Splatsin Indian Band as an addition to ENDERBY INDIAN RESERVE NO. 2, located in the Regional District of North Okanagan at approximately two kilometres from the Town of Enderby, in British Columbia.
AttachmentsAttachment
